author: ajaquith
msg: Further refinements to Stripes-related JSPs. Refactoring of Login/Profile/View ActionBeans. Introduction of Stripes layout system, which makes templating somewhat easier (but at the moment all Stripes JSPs are  hardwired to 'default').

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-4874. Remove LZO codec because of licensing issues. (omalley)

msg: o get rid of the duplicate super pom, it can be shared from the project builder

msg: o keep a single copy of the super pom here, this can be shared outside of maven more easily
